result.msg: This label's "for" attribute contains an ID that does not exist in the document fragment.
This textinput element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title , aria-label , aria-labelledby .
result.code:
<input class="pl-0"
type="text" id="s" name="s"
placeholder="What can we help
you find?">

result.msg: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
result.code:
<input class="pl-0"
type="text" id="s" name="s"
placeholder="What can we help
you find?">
